item.description:
Let meet-up this Friday and dance and listen to live Brazilian music.

There will even be a live Samba dance performance.

This event should be really fun.

There is a Forro dance lesson with Glenio from 8-9pm.

There is a discount cover charge for students and their guests.

The guest list cost is $5 and $10 for others.

All the people that sign-up, I will make sure your name gets on the list.

************UPDATE*************

THE COVER CHARGE INCLUDES THE DANCE LESSON!!!!!!!!!!!

********************************



When you reply, let me know if you are attending the lesson and/or the party.

Check out our website for details www.learndancesamba.vpweb.com
We hope to see you there!

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Brazilian Samba/Forro Dance Lesson and Party
